## User Story Title
***As*** User
***I want to*** Action
***so that*** Outcome

## User Story Cases
When I do this | This happens
-------------|--------------
Action A | Outcome A
Action B | Outcome B
Action C | Outcome C

## Estimated Time (hours) 
**Choose from: 1,2,3,5,8,13**
e.g. 5
